myArrayList.description:
So, you've decided that you want to learn R or you want to get familiar with it, but don't know where to start? Or are you a data/business analyst or data scientist that wants to have a smooth transition into R programming?


Then, this course was designed just for you!


This course was designed to be your first step into the R programming world! We will delve deeper into the concepts of R objects, understand the R user interface and play around with several datasets. This course contains lectures around the following groups:

1. Basics of R

2. Control Statements in R

3. Functions in R

4. Data Structures in R

5. Plotting Graphs in R

6. Assignments in R


This course was designed to be focused on the practical side of coding in R - instead of teaching you every function and method out there, I'll show you how you can read questions and examples and get to the answer by yourself, compounding your knowledge on the different R objects.

At the end of the course you should be able to use R to analyze your own datasets. Along the way you will also learn what R vectors, arrays, matrixes and lists are and how you can combine the knowledge of those objects to power up your analysis.


Here are some examples of things you will be able to do after finishing the course:


  • Do interesting line plots that enable you to draw conclusions from data.

  • Plot histograms of numerical data.

  • Create your own functions that will enable you to reutilize code.

  • Data Structures in R



Join thousands of professionals and students in this R journey and discover the amazing power of this statistical open-source language.

This course will be constantly updated based on students feedback.

myArrayList.title: 10 Essential Rules for Self-Defense
myArrayList.author: P.J. Agness
myArrayList.heading: A Self-Defense course with custom certificate by Archangel Protective Intelligence
myArrayList.description:
Self-defense is a critical skill that everyone should possess. Unfortunately, violence and danger are a reality of life, and we cannot always rely on law enforcement or security personnel to keep us safe. This is where self-defense comes in, allowing us to protect ourselves and our loved ones from harm.


If you are looking for practical and effective ways to defend yourself, then the "10 Essentials for Self-Defense" is the course for you. Presented by P.J. Agness, a best-selling author and founder of Archangel Protective Intelligence, this lecture will cover ten essential principles of self-defense that are designed to keep you safe in any situation.


Self-defense is not just about physical strength or combat training. It is a holistic approach that includes awareness, preparation, and the ability to think on your feet. In this lecture, you will learn how to develop situational awareness and stay alert and observant. You will also discover how to prepare mentally and physically for a self-defense situation and how to use the tools at your disposal effectively.


This course is suitable for everyone, regardless of age or gender. Whether you are a student heading off to college, a parent wanting to protect your family, or anyone looking to improve your self-defense skills, this lecture will equip you with the knowledge and confidence you need to stay safe.


So why is this course so necessary? The sad truth is that violence can happen anywhere and at any time. Crimes such as assault, robbery, and sexual assault can occur in broad daylight, in public places, or even in your own home. By learning self-defense, you are taking a proactive approach to your safety and preparing yourself to handle any situation that may arise.


Moreover, self-defense is not just about protecting yourself physically. It is also about developing a sense of empowerment and confidence. Knowing that you have the skills and knowledge to defend yourself can boost your self-esteem and help you navigate through life with a greater sense of security and peace of mind.


With P.J. Agness as your guide, you will learn the essential principles of self-defense.
